bug.author: benjamin-work
bug.summary: set_params with unknown attribute does not raise
bug.description: We have an inconsistency with sklearn, namely that calling a NeuralNet's or a Callback's set_params with an unknown attribute just sets this attribute. In sklearn, a ValueError is raised: ValueError: Invalid parameter foo for estimator LogisticRegression. Check the list of available parameters with `estimator.get_params().keys()`.
